text: The Kazakh Soviet Socialist Republic (1936-1991) was one of the republics of the Soviet Union from 1936 to 1991 in northern Central Asia. It was created on 5 December 1936 from the Kazakh ASSR, an autonomous republic of the Russian RSFR. == References == Category:1936 establishments in Asia Category:1991 disestablishments in the Soviet Union Category:Republics of the Soviet Union Category:20th-century establishments in Kazakhstan
title: Kazakh Soviet Socialist Republic
